data.persona: i take care of the temple of the King. I am poor and looked down upon by most people. I work hard to maintain the cleanliness of the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Chapel of the eight.
Made entirely out of gold and with precious jewels all around. Sculptures and many symbols with a red carpet goes from the entrance up until the end of the chapel.
There's a tapestry, a Sculpture, a jewel, a gold, and a red carpet here.
The king and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will make a headdress with the flower.
data.mid_motivation: I will give the king the headdress of fertility so that the queen bears a child.
data.long_motivation: The king will shower me in riches and treat me as royalty if the headdress helps them conceive a prince.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use sculpture and tapestry with flower

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give headdress of fertility to king
